pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Bootstrap Augmented k-Means Algorithm for Fuzzy Partitions // Implementation of the bootkmeans algorithm, a bootstrap augmented k-means algorithm that returns probabilistic cluster assignments. From paper by Ghashti, J.S., Andrews, J.L. Thompson, J.R.J., Epp, J. and H.S. Kochar (2025), "A bootstrap augmented k-means algorithm for fuzzy partitions" (Submitted).
